name: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4
description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4 introduces a revolutionary foldable design, featuring a flexible display that unfolds to provide a tablet-like experience. It boasts a powerful Snapdragon 9 Gen 2 processor, a versatile camera system, and enhanced multitasking capabilities.

name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro
description: The Apple iPhone 15 Pro sets new standards for performance and innovation, powered by the groundbreaking A17 Bionic chip. It features a stunning ProMotion XDR display, a revolutionary camera system with LiDAR technology, and ultra-fast 5G connectivity.

name: Google Pixel 7
description: The Google Pixel 7 brings unparalleled AI capabilities and photography expertise, powered by the latest Google Tensor 2 chip. It features a refined design, a cutting-edge camera system with advanced computational photography, and seamless integration with Google services.

name: OnePlus 12 Pro
description: The OnePlus 12 Pro raises the bar for flagship smartphones with its lightning-fast Warp Charge technology, a stunning 150Hz Fluid AMOLED display, and the latest Snapdragon 9 Gen 3 processor. It also offers a versatile camera system and OxygenOS for a smooth user experience.

name: Xiaomi 14
description: The Xiaomi 14 combines premium design with cutting-edge technology, featuring a powerful camera system co-engineered with Hasselblad, a vibrant AMOLED display, and ultra-fast charging capabilities.

name: Motorola Edge 40
description: The Motorola Edge 40 offers exceptional value with its sleek design, a versatile triple-camera system, and a long-lasting battery. It also features a smooth 120Hz display and 5G connectivity for fast and reliable performance.
